title: Terraform AWS Cloud Control API provider now generally available
summary: The Terraform AWS Cloud Control provider helps you use new AWS services faster with Terraform

title: ‘Operation Endgame’ Hits Malware Delivery Platforms
summary: Law enforcement agencies in the United States and Europe today announced Operation Endgame, a coordinated action against some of the most popular cybercrime platforms for delivering ransomware and data-stealing malware.  Dubbed "the largest ever operation against botnets," the international effort is being billed as the opening salvo in an ongoing campaign targeting advanced malware "droppers" or "loaders" like IcedID, Smokeloader and Trickbot

title: Introducing auto exit nodes
summary: Auto exit nodes are a new Tailscale feature to connect users to the nearest and most performant exit node to access the public internet.  With auto exit nodes, employers can support remote work by ensuring employees have the best available connection and aren't stuck looking for less secure workarounds

title: Disrupting FlyingYeti's campaign targeting Ukraine
summary: In April and May 2024, Cloudforce One employed proactive defense measures to successfully prevent Russia-aligned threat actor FlyingYeti from launching their latest phishing campaign targeting Ukraine

title: Cloudflare acquires BastionZero to extend Zero Trust access to IT infrastructure
summary: We’re excited to announce that BastionZero, a Zero Trust infrastructure access platform, has joined Cloudflare.  This acquisition extends our Zero Trust Network Access (ZTNA) flows with native access management for infrastructure like servers, Kubernetes clusters, and databases

title: Wiz AI-SPM model scanning: Securely innovate with AI community models
summary: Detect malicious hosted AI models with Wiz AI-SPM and gain confidence in the models your data scientists use

title: Takeaways from the Google Content Warehouse API documentation leak
summary: My thoughts on Google's Content Warehouse API doc leak, what we can learn from its ranking factors, and why the following SEO hype is overblown

title: My formative games
summary: I’m not a huge gamer.  I’ve got a few consoles, I’ve played a fair few games, but I would never say it’s my number one hobby, and I can go weeks in between switching any console on.  But there are a handful of games that I think are a big part of my formative years...

title: What's next for Kagi?
summary: Two years ago, on June 1st, 2022, Kagi introduced ( https://blog. kagi. com/kagi-orion-public-beta ) a search engine that challenged the ad-supported version of the web

title: Is Your Computer Part of ‘The Largest Botnet Ever?’
summary: The U. S.  Department of Justice (DOJ) today said they arrested the alleged operator of 911 S5, a ten-year-old online anonymity service that was powered by what the director of the FBI called "likely the world's largest botnet ever...

title: Nomad 1.8 adds exec2 task driver, support for Consul API gateway, and transparent proxy
summary: HashiCorp Nomad 1. 8 introduces an exec2 driver, a refreshed UI for the jobs index page, Consul API gateway and transparent proxy support, and more

title: Standardize your cloud approach with Infrastructure Lifecycle Management
summary: Build, deploy, and manage all of your infrastructure with a single workflow with Infrastructure Lifecycle Management solutions from HashiCorp

title: Mitigate cloud risk with Security Lifecycle Management
summary: Protect, inspect, and connect your sensitive data with Security Lifecycle Management solutions from HashiCorp

title: Back to working from home
summary: One of the side effects of moving house has been that I’m now going to be working from home after being in a coworking space for the last two years.  I enjoyed having a dedicated office space for myself, mainly because I had the commute to separate work from home, and it was a separate space that was just about work, so fewer blurred lines.  It doesn’t make sense to be paying for a desk now that I have space to work from here, though...

title: Wiz launches new data center in UAE, supercharging global operations in the region
summary: Organizations in the region can now benefit from Wiz's cloud security platform while maintaining their data sovereignty and privacy requirements

title: Treasury Sanctions Creators of 911 S5 Proxy Botnet
summary: The U. S.  Department of the Treasury today unveiled sanctions against three Chinese nationals for allegedly operating 911 S5, an online anonymity service that for many years was the easiest and cheapest way to route one's Web traffic through malware-infected computers around the globe...
